B2 relating to ecology or the environment: The destruction of the rain forests is an ecological disaster.
More examplesFewer examplesThe ecological effects of the factory need to be balanced against the employment it generates.The ecological consequences of a nuclear war are incalculable.High petrol taxes can be defended on ecological grounds.They were warned of the ecological catastrophe to come.This species has its own unique ecological niche, which we are in danger of destroying.
